def_en: If someone belches, they make a sudden noise in their throat because air has risen up from their stomach.

def_cn: 喷出，冒出（烟、火等）；（烟、火等）喷出，冒出
def_en: If a machine or chimney belches something such as smoke or fire or if smoke or fire belches from it, large amounts of smoke or fire come from it.
